fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: Time of the measurement, floored to 15 sec

fields.name: xname
fields.doc: Unique identifier for the node of the measurement, e.g. x2509c4s4b1

fields.name: row
fields.doc: Row index of the node.

fields.name: col
fields.doc: Col index of the node

fields.name: chassis
fields.doc: Chassis index of the node

fields.name: blade
fields.doc: Blade index of the node

fields.name: node
fields.doc: Node index on blade, 0 or 1

fields.name: allocation_id
fields.doc: Allocation Id of the job associated with this record

fields.name: job_time_start
fields.doc: Start time of the job associated with this record

fields.name: node_power
fields.doc: Total node power usage (unit: W, interval: 2 sec)

fields.name: node_temp
fields.doc: Max temperature seen on the node (unit: degC)

fields.name: node_energy
fields.doc: Energy counter for node (unit: J, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: node_energy_delta
fields.doc: Energy consumed by node in this timestep (unit: J)

fields.name: cpu0_power
fields.doc: Power usage of CPU0 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: cpu0_temp
fields.doc: Temperature of CPU0 (unit: degC, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: cpu0_energy
fields.doc: Energy counter for CPU0 (unit: J, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: cpu0_energy_delta
fields.doc: Energy consumed by CPU0 in this timestep (unit: J)

fields.name: gpu0_power
fields.doc: Power usage of GPU0 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: gpu0_temp
fields.doc: Temperature of GPU0 (unit: degC, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu0_energy
fields.doc: Energy counter for GPU0 (unit: J, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu0_energy_delta
fields.doc: Energy consumed by GPU0 in this timestep (unit: J)

fields.name: gpu1_power
fields.doc: Power usage of GPU1 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: gpu1_temp
fields.doc: Temperature of GPU1 (unit: degC, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu1_energy
fields.doc: Energy counter for GPU1 (unit: J, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu1_energy_delta
fields.doc: Energy consumed by GPU1 in this timestep (unit: J)

fields.name: gpu2_power
fields.doc: Power usage of GPU2 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: gpu2_temp
fields.doc: Temperature of GPU2 (unit: degC, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu2_energy
fields.doc: Energy counter for GPU2 (unit: J, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu2_energy_delta
fields.doc: Energy consumed by GPU2 in this timestep (unit: J)

fields.name: gpu3_power
fields.doc: Power usage of GPU3 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: gpu3_temp
fields.doc: Temperature of GPU3 (unit: degC, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu3_energy
fields.doc: Energy counter for GPU3 (unit: J, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: gpu3_energy_delta
fields.doc: Energy consumed by GPU3 in this timestep (unit: J)

fields.name: cpu_memory_power
fields.doc: Power usage of RAM (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: cpu_memory_energy
fields.doc: Energy counter for RAM (unit: J, interval: 1 min)

fields.name: cpu_memory_energy_delta
fields.doc: Energy consumed by RAM in this timestep (unit: J)
